Articles.Content: After spending a lot of time creating a craft, when saving, the craft doesn't save and also doesn't show in the saved craft, or even the prior saved craft. In this state the game doesn't even want to launch a craft unless I back out and launch directly from the launchpad (which wouldn't have the craft you just worked on because it never saved)

This thread has been moved from KSP 2 Discussion since it is more of a bug report.

Forum Moderation Team
Am seeing this issue as well. It seems I can load in and see the craft file I was working on but saves and launches arent working.  Clicking load only shows the stock craft files.
Similar or same problem here. Can load craft in VAB, but it does not show at the launch pad. Can not launch from the VAB, the button doesn't operate. And the problem persists to brand new craft.

Have a look on that, because I was thinking my craft is not loaded, until I found that a couple of upper parts were showing a little above te VAB ground. It is like the ship is loaded, but below the ground level, and only the top of the ship shows a little.
